customer_name: Carol Bacon, John Hardisty and Tammy Hardisty
site_name: Carol Bacon John Hardisty and Tammy Hardisty

citations.narrative:
The outdoor primary enclosure housing two ducks does not have a pool or equivalent aquatic area. Failure to provide an
aquatic area prevents these animals from exhibiting normal species behaviors such as immersion, bathing, and
swimming. This may result in behavioral concerns or the animals’ inability to conduct normal grooming and preening
activities, which could impact their health.
The facility must ensure that primary enclosures housing wading and aquatic birds contain a pool or other aquatic area of
sufficient surface area and depth to allow each bird to make normal postural and social adjustments, as well as a dry area
that allows easy ingress or egress of the pool or other aquatic area. To be corrected by May 23, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.153(c) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
The outdoor primary enclosure housing two ducks does not have a pool or equivalent aquatic area. Failure to provide an 
aquatic area prevents these animals from exhibiting normal species behaviors such as immersion, bathing, and 
swimming. This may result in behavioral concerns or the animals’ inability to conduct normal grooming and preening 
activities, which could impact their health. 
 
The facility must ensure that primary enclosures housing wading and aquatic birds contain a pool or other aquatic area of 
sufficient surface area and depth to allow each bird to make normal postural and social adjustments, as well as a dry area 
that allows easy ingress or egress of the pool or other aquatic area. To be corrected by May 23, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
